sect1.title: Attribute Value Matcher
sect1.para: This filter allows users to filter out concepts or relations that have an attribute with a particular value. In order to illustrate how it works, the Colour Concepts by General Attribute Annotator was run on the data prior to this first screenshot. The colour legend shows the phenotype of each concept. Let's try to delete all concepts that carry the phenotype "Loss of pathogenicity". This should eliminate the green concepts within this isolated cluster.
As a user, you may select "concepts" or "relations", a type of attribute ("Phenotype" in this case) and a value for that attribute (here "Loss of pathogenicity").
